title: The Ghost
description: THE GHOST is the first novelette in The Supernatural Stations series. The second, THE SINISTER is now available in eBook and paperback. CLARA, the third novelette would be released in Spring 2014. Each novelette are between 15,000-17,500 words. This series would appeal to any horror fan from age 13 upwards. Do you believe in GHOSTS?Middleclass lawyer James Fisher has been commuting from his home to London VictoriaStation for 5 years. Apart from the train beingcongested, he always had a pleasant journeyto his workplace.Until today. It all begins as a bad dream for Fisher, the grey darkening sky that spills over Victoria Station. The creepy sound that engulfs the entire station. The echoes of the dead which fill the station andthe other passengers who do not stir. Soon JamesFisher wakes, thinking it all a dream.Then it happens. In the next 24 hours, he would discover the answer to his worst childhood nightmare:‘Are ghosts real ?’AN EERIE GHOST STORY AWAITS YOU
author: Ada Uzoije
